    Description
    ClusterIdentifier
    Identifies a cluster of servers that work together.
    Scope
    Specifies a visibility and search scope for registering and discovering services.
    Scope.Type
    The type of scope
    Service
    A logical service of a particular type that can be registered by an application with a local or network service registry, and subsequently discovered by client registry searches.
    ServiceMetadata
    Metadata describing a Service.

    Not public API

    This class defines a KivaKit Project.
    ServiceRegistrySettings
    Service registry settings.
    ServiceRegistryUpdater
    Sends a service registry update from a local service registry to the network service registry.

    An identifier for a particular kind of service
